artist: Designer: Elizabeth Salonen; Manufacturer: Vallila Interior
creditline: Gift of Vallila Interior, Helsinki - Finland
description: repeating rows of arched windows with columns; most windows are bare--five different styles of drapes in some windows; black and red printed on white (red ground)
markings: attached to long side with plastic: manufacturer\'s paper tag
signed: along one long side, printed (repeating) in black: [VALLILA   \"Viiskulma\"  Elizabeth Salonen  2011]
title: Viiskulma
